amendment.description: Amendment prohibits individuals who are delinquent in making court-ordered child support payments from receiving food stamps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit individuals who are delinquent in making court-ordered child support payments from receiving food stamps.

action.text: Upton amendment (A015) modified by unanimous consent. The modification would exempt from the prohibition any individual who has received court permission to delay child support payments.
On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A015) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
